description: Renames the specified organizational unit (OU). The ID and ARN don't change. The child OUs and accounts remain in place, and any attached policies of the OU remain attached. This operation can be called only from the organization's management account.

parameters.name: OrganizationalUnitId
parameters.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the OU that you want to rename. You can get the ID from the  ListOrganizationalUnitsForParent operation. The regex pattern for an organizational unit ID string requires 'ou-' followed by from 4 to 32 lowercase letters or digits (the ID of the root that contains the OU). This string is followed by a second '-' dash and from 8 to 32 additional lowercase letters or digits.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The new name that you want to assign to the OU. The regex pattern that is used to validate this parameter is a string of any of the characters in the ASCII character range.

nested_items.name: OrganizationalUnit
nested_items.description: A structure that contains the details about the specified OU, including its new name.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier (ID) associated with this OU. The ID is unique to the organization only.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of this OU.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The friendly name of this OU.
